document.title: Pellete de liens du 24-08-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Peu de temps pour poster ces derniers jours, mais que cela n'empeche pas la traditionnelle pelletee de liens

Eclipse Web Tools Platform Project The WTP project extends the Eclipse platform with tools for developing J2EE Web applications, including : source editors for HTML, Javascript, CSS, JSP, SQL, XML, DTD, XSD, and WSDL. (Tags: xml javascript css xhtml sql java eclipse extension dtd j2ee plugin webstandards )

PHP Input Filter PHP Input Filter is a free php class that allows developers to easily filter input coming from the user (HTML forms, cookies etc). (Tags: php security forms lib )
